metadata.title: CVE-2021-44961 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: A memory leakage flaw exists in the class PerimeterGenerator of Slic3r libslic3r 1.3.0 and Master Commit b1a5500. Specially crafted stl files can exhaust available memory. An attacker can provide malicious files to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: slic3r package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
